content: **this crochet houndstooth triangle cowl pattern is a simple and easy pattern to follow it can also be made in a worsted or dk weight yarn ** view the pattern here 1 **size ** flat 9 neck opening 16-18 length 17 width at widest point **stitches & techniques used ** chains slip_stitch single_crochet double_crochet front and back post stitches working in turned rounds **yarn ** #3 dk light worsted weight lion brand superwash merino or yarn bee must be merino 240 yards a 125 yards b #4 worsted weight lion brand heartland 210 yards a 110 yards b or suitable substitutes **tools ** us size g+/7 4 5mm crochet hook for #3 dk yarn us size j/10 6 0mm crochet hook for #4 worsted yarn **other ** **read through all of the pattern notes before beginning** and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns follow me on instagram @simplyhookedbyjanet join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer 1 https //www simplyhookedbyjanet com/crochet-houndstooth-triangle-cowl-pattern/
